description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Hit, Stand, or even Double Down. Can you get closer to 21 than the dealer? Casino style Blackjack with a golden twist. Certain royal cards are golden, if you win a hand with one of these, you win a bonus! Up to four players can play online or offline. Earn Awards, progress through 100 Ranks and unlock more backgrounds and card decks. Version 1.4
